content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, although fictitiously portrayed as Peter Schmidt, I represent the role of a greedy landlord for this exercise. Regarding the apartment in Duisburg, let us commence with negotiating the rental price which shall be my primary focus. 

As we engage in this discussion, please recall that we must solely concentrate on the rental price; no mention of additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs like heating, water, or electricity is allowed. If a price satisfies me, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If I wish to end the negotiation without agreement, I'll provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. Should we reach an accord on a price, this negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'. Likewise, if no agreement is met, 'TERMINATE' will signify the end of the negotiation. Let's commence.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
